parameter.name: pageId
parameter.description: Unique identifier of the page

parameter.name: message
parameter.description: The main body of the post

parameter.name: link
parameter.description: The URL of a link to attach to the post

parameter.name: picture
parameter.description: Determines the preview image associated with the link

parameter.name: name
parameter.description: Overwrites the title of the link preview

parameter.name: caption
parameter.description: Overwrites the caption under the title in the link preview

parameter.name: description
parameter.description: Overwrites the description in the link preview

parameter.name: actions
parameter.description: The action links attached to the post

parameter.name: place
parameter.description: Page ID of a location associated with this post

parameter.name: tags
parameter.description: List of user IDs of people tagged in this post

parameter.name: objectAttachment
parameter.description: Facebook ID for an existing picture

parameter.name: targeting
parameter.description: Object that limits the audience for this content

parameter.name: feedTargeting
parameter.description: Object that controls news feed targeting for this content

parameter.name: published
parameter.description: Whether a story is shown about this newly published object

parameter.name: scheduledPublishTime
parameter.description: Time when this post should go live

parameter.name: backdatedTime
parameter.description: Specifies a time in the past to back-date this post to

parameter.name: backdatedTimeGranularity
parameter.description: Controls the display of how a backdated post appears

parameter.name: childAttachments
parameter.description: Use to specify multiple links in the post.

parameter.name: multiShareOptimized
parameter.description: Order of links to be used in child_attachments.

parameter.name: multiShareEndCard
parameter.description: Whether display the end card of a carousel link post when child_attachments is used.
